thread.section_title: Space City Drones Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Space City Drones | spacecitydrones.com
thread.title: Francisco Romero
thread.title_full: Space City Drones reviewed by Francisco Romero

author: Francisco Romero
title: Francisco Romero
text: I preordered the Mavic for an October release and even though DJI constantly delayed the shipment, Jason was on top of what was happening with my order, I never had to inquire about the drone because he was at the ready to give me all the info he was receiving at the time. Even when he had to step down because of his accident, his wife Jackie took over and with the little experience she had; she made sure I was aware of everything going on. This company really cares about their customers and they go above and beyond to make sure you have a pleasant and satisfactory experience. The Mavic arrived yesterday and I couldn’t be happier. I have not tried it yet because we’re having a little bit of rain here in California at the moment, but as soon as the skies clear I’ll be giving it a go. Thank you for such a nice experience!
